mapper.select: SELECT b.cr_id id, b.cr_company company, b.cr_hiredate hiredate, b.cr_leavedate leavedate, b.cr_lvreason lvreason, b.cr_post post, b.cr_dept dept, b.cr_area area, b.cr_salary salary, b.cr_work work, a.mem_userid userid FROM hr_member a left join hr_career b on a.mem_userid = b.mem_userid where a.mem_userid = #{userid} ORDER BY b.cr_id DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE hr_career SET cr_company = #{company}, cr_hiredate = #{hiredate}, cr_leavedate = #{leavedate}, cr_lvreason = ##{lvreason}, cr_post = #{post}, cr_dept = #{dept}, cr_area = #{area}, cr_salary = #{salary}, cr_work = #{work} WHERE mem_userid = #{userid} and cr_id = #{id}
